snippet: The federal police began arresting a dozen powerful political figures, bankers and businessmen convicted in a vast vote-buying scandal that surfaced more than eight years ago.
abstract: Federal police in Brazil arrest dozen powerful political figures, bankers and businessmen convicted in a vast vote-buying scandal.
lead_paragraph: The federal police began arresting a dozen powerful political figures, bankers and businessmen convicted in a vast vote-buying scandal that surfaced more than eight years ago.

headline.main: Brazil: Arrests Begin in Vote-Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Brazil: Arrests Begin in Vote-Fraud Case
